Package sait.frms.manager

Class ReservationManager

java.lang.Object
sait.frms.manager.ReservationManager
public class ReservationManager
extends java.lang.Object
Used to manage the reservations in the program.

  • Constructor Details

    • ReservationManager

      public ReservationManager() throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a reservation manager.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Thrown when unable to create or access the binary file used to store the reservations

  • Method Details

    • makeReservation

      public Reservation makeReservation​(Flight flight, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String citizenship) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a reservation manager.
      Parameters:
      flight - desired flight for reservation
      name - customer name
      citizenship - customer citizenship
      Returns:
      reservation that it creates
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Thrown when unable to create or access the binary file used to store the reservations

    • persist

      private void persist​(Reservation reservation) throws java.io.IOException
      used to preserve a reservation to the binary file.
      Parameters:
      reservation - to be preserved
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Thrown when unable to create or access the binary file used to store the reservations

    • findReservations

      public java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> findReservations​(java.lang.String code, java.lang.String airline, java.lang.String name)
      Used to find the reservations, filtered by the parameters.
      Parameters:
      code - refers to reservation code
      airline - refers to airline code
      name - refers to customer name
      Returns:
      a list of matching reservations

    • findReservationByCode

      public Reservation findReservationByCode​(java.lang.String code)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a reservation based on code

    • generateReservationCode

      private java.lang.String generateReservationCode​(Flight flight)
      Used to generate a reservation code for the reservation.
      Parameters:
      flight - used to check if it is international or domestic
      Returns:
      a reservation code

    • updateReservation

      public void updateReservation​(Reservation r1) throws java.io.IOException
      Used to update the reservation on both the list and binary file.
      Parameters:
      r1 - the new reservation object
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Thrown when unable to create or access the binary file used to store the reservations

    • populateFromBinary

      private void populateFromBinary() throws java.io.IOException
      Populates the reservation list from the binary file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Thrown when unable to create or access the binary file used to store the reservations

    • seatAvailable

      public boolean seatAvailable​(Flight flight)
      Used to return if a flight is booked or has available seats
      Parameters:
      flight - flight that we are checking for seats on
      Returns:
      a boolean that indicates if it has seats available
